target.mrk: À propos de la supervision de l'activité

trans-unit.source: The Activity Monitoring displays information on backup, restore, replication, and maintenance.

seg-source.mrk: The Activity Monitoring displays information on backup, restore, replication, and maintenance.

target.mrk: La supervision de l'activité affiche des informations sur la sauvegarde, la restauration, la réplication et la maintenance.

trans-unit.source: These are the information you have access to based on:

seg-source.mrk: These are the information you have access to based on:

target.mrk: Les informations auxquelles vous avez accès se basent sur :

trans-unit.source: The number of blocks refers to the blocks processed.

seg-source.mrk: The number of blocks refers to the blocks processed.

target.mrk: Le nombre de blocs correspond au nombre de blocs traités.

trans-unit.source: The number of objects represents the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> files and folders backed up or restored.

seg-source.mrk: The number of objects represents the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> files and folders backed up or restored.

target.mrk: Le nombre d'objets représente les fichiers et dossiers <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> sauvegardés ou restaurés.

trans-unit.source: The number of streams represents the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> streams backed up or restored.

seg-source.mrk: The number of streams represents the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> streams backed up or restored.

target.mrk: Le nombre de flux représente les flux <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> sauvegardés ou restaurés.

trans-unit.source: Data is shown for a one, five or fifteen minute time interval depending on what has been selected on the left menu.

seg-source.mrk: Data is shown for a one, five or fifteen minute time interval depending on what has been selected on the left menu.

target.mrk: Les données sont affichées pour un intervalle de temps d'une, cinq ou quinze minute(s), selon ce qui a été sélectionné dans le menu de gauche.

trans-unit.source: Displays real time information on a per second basis of ongoing backup and restore operations on <server_name>.

seg-source.mrk: Displays real time information on a per second basis of ongoing backup and restore operations on <server_name>.

target.mrk: Affiche en temps réel par seconde des informations sur les opérations de sauvegarde et de restauration en cours sur nom_serveur .

trans-unit.source: The number of blocks refers to the blocks processed. <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">The number of objects represents the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> files and folders backed up or restored.</MadCap:conditionalText>

seg-source.mrk: The number of blocks refers to the blocks processed.

<MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">The number of objects represents the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> files and folders backed up or restored.</MadCap:conditionalText>

target.mrk: Le nombre de blocs fait référence au nombre de blocs traités.

<MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Le nombre d'objets représente les fichiers et dossiers <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> sauvegardés ou restaurés.</MadCap:conditionalText>

trans-unit.source: Displays real time information on a per second basis of ongoing maintenance operations on <server_name>.

seg-source.mrk: Displays real time information on a per second basis of ongoing maintenance operations on <server_name>.

target.mrk: Affiche en temps réel par seconde des informations sur les opérations de maintenance en cours sur nom_serveur.

trans-unit.source: Maintenance takes place in two steps:

seg-source.mrk: Maintenance takes place in two steps:

target.mrk: La maintenance se déroule en deux étapes :

trans-unit.source: Deleted or modified data (i.e., a more recent version of the data has been backed up) that have reached the end of their retention period, are unreferenced from the database, but are not physically removed from the repository. Data is then said to be recyclable.

seg-source.mrk: Deleted or modified data (i.e., a more recent version of the data has been backed up) that have reached the end of their retention period, are unreferenced from the database, but are not physically removed from the repository.
Data is then said to be recyclable.

target.mrk: Les données supprimées ou modifiées (c.-à-d. une version plus récente des données a été sauvegardée) qui ont atteint la fin de leur période de rétention, qui ne sont pas référencées dans la base de données, mais qui ne sont pas physiquement supprimées de l'espace de stockage.

trans-unit.source: The recyclable blocks, provided that they are no longer present in any backup, are deleted from the repository during a compacting operation. For the deduplicated repository, the maintenance information shown is always physical, while for <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, the maintenance information is referenced. The number of objects deleted concerns <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> only.

seg-source.mrk: The recyclable blocks, provided that they are no longer present in any backup, are deleted from the repository during a compacting operation.

For the deduplicated repository, the maintenance information shown is always physical, while for <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, the maintenance information is referenced.
The number of objects deleted concerns <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> only.

target.mrk: Les blocs recyclables, à condition qu'ils ne soient plus présents dans aucune sauvegarde, sont supprimés du répertoire lors d'une opération de compactage.

Pour le référentiel dédupliqué, les informations de maintenance affichées sont toujours physiques alors que pour le <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> et <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, les informations de maintenance sont référencées.
Le nombre d'objets supprimés concerne seulement <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
